ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to the Hon. CAROLYN A. LAYDEN-STEVENSON, a Judge of the Federal Court of Canada who was required to move from Fredericton to the National Capital Region.
AttachmentsAttachment
